author: USA TODAY, Deborah Barfield Berry, USA TODAY
title: Michelle Obama, Tom Hanks, Selena Gomez and other celebs urge Americans to fill out Census 2020
description: Amid the coronavirus outbreak, community groups are making a big push for Census Day with celebrities such as Tom Hanks and Michelle Obama.
content:
President Trump is expected to drop his fight to get the citizenship question for the 2020 census. What is the census and why does the U.S. have one? We explain.
USA TODAY
